name: Oatmeal Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375F. Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in small bowl.

Beat butter, peanut butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract in large mixer bowl until creamy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Gradually beat in flour mixture. Stir in chocolate, morsels and oats. Drop by tablespoon onto baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until light golden brown. Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes.
